## Suggested Change

## Rabbit Holes

<!-- Scope risks to avoid -->

- Don't rewrite entire document if only section needs fixing
- Keep changes focused on the specific issue

## Done Looks Like

<!-- Specific criteria for improvement -->

- [ ] Documentation is accurate
- [ ] Documentation is clear to target audience
- [ ] Passes markdownlint validation
- [ ] Cross-references are valid

## Verification Steps

- [ ] Run `markdownlint-cli2` on changed files
- [ ] Review rendered markdown in preview
- [ ] Verify any code examples work
